headline: Show HN: SkillPress – Learn JavaScript via spaced repetition and active recall
description:
When I was getting into web development I used a combination of Anki and git to help me quickly learn and retain skills. Figuring there might be demand for a product that uses the same strategy (without the requirement that you already know Anki and git), I created SkillPress.
No account is needed to start learning. I would greatly appreciate any feedback or suggestions.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: SkillPress - 通过间隔性重复和主动回忆学习JavaScript
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: SkillPress - 通過間隔性重複和主動回憶學習JavaScript
description_zh-Hans:
当我开始接触网络开发时，我使用Anki和git的组合来帮助我快速学习和保留技能。考虑到对使用相同策略的产品可能有需求（不要求你已经知道Anki和git），我创建了SkillPress。
开始学习不需要账户。我将非常感谢任何反馈或建议。
description_zh-Hant:
當我開始接觸網絡開發時，我使用Anki和git的組合來幫助我快速學習和保留技能。考慮到對使用相同策略的產品可能有需求（不要求你已經知道Anki和git），我創建了SkillPress。
開始學習不需要賬戶。我將非常感謝任何反饋或建議。
